description: Provide manual labour on an “as and when required” basis to work alongside and assist PSPC Damkeepers in completing their regular daily tasks of dam operations at the Timiskaming and Latchford Dams and with other associated tasks as stated in Annex A – Statement of Work. This requirement is for Public Services and Procurement Canada at the Timiskaming Dam Complex located near Témiscaming, Quebec and Thorne, Ontario and Latchford Dam located in the Town of Latchford, Ontario.
full_summary:
### EP168-230254 Damkeeper Labour for Timiskaming and Latchford Dams

#### Tender Details:
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4171213277-Doc4171535888 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4171213277 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-18T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-01-01 |
| Trade Agreements | Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement |
| Region of Opportunity | Timiskaming, Latchford |
| Region of Delivery | Timiskaming, Latchford |

#### Tender Description:
The Canadian government's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide manual labour on an “as and when required” basis to assist PSPC Damkeepers in completing their regular daily tasks of dam operations at the Timiskaming and Latchford Dams. This requirement is for Public Services and Procurement Canada at the Timiskaming Dam Complex located near Témiscaming, Quebec, and Thorne, Ontario, and Latchford Dam located in the Town of Latchford, Ontario.

#### Request for Proposal:
The procurement method is competitive and open to all interested suppliers. Proposals should be submitted electronically using the online procurement platform established for this purpose.

#### Supplier Requirements:
The selected supplier must have the necessary qualifications and experience to provide manual labour services of the required scope and level. The government reserves the right to verify the credentials and qualifications of the suppliers.

#### Notice:
For more information, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17361927?extsite=MTczNjE5MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17361927?ext
